Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a unique offering that we believe could significantly enhance your daily routine or project. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I would like to propose a price of $150 for it. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive warranty and customer support service. I trust this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
